items.sentence: Let me show you the Christmas card Tom sent me.
Tom didn't know that I was coming to Australia.
Tom said he didn't want to sleep in the garage.
Tom said he didn't really want to learn French.
Tom doesn't yet know that his wife is pregnant.
Tom said that he didn't want to come back here.
Tom says that he wants to learn a new language.
Is it true Tom lived in Boston for three years?
Some of those rescued were pretty badly burned.
Have you been to any of the places on the list?
Tom told me he thought that Mary was insincere.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was exhausted.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was courteous.
Tom told me he thought that Mary was bilingual.
Tom told me he thought that Mary had done that.
The dress that Mary is wearing looks expensive.
Tom has about half as many stamps as Mary does.
Tom has been sentenced to three months in jail.
Tom went to the river to get a bucket of water.
It's a miracle that Tom survived that accident.
